category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_processing_allowed_file_types
preference.preference_description: Specifies valid International Material Data System (IMDS) file types that can be processed by International Material Data System (IMDS) dat to XML transformation utility. Valid and default values are: CMSAll CCAll SBAll SRAll NIAll SARAll SAAll SGAll MCAll MPSAll CMSDaily CCDaily SBDaily MPSDaily REQDaily OMDDaily
